Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Ambush +35% to critical strike chance with attacks +138% to critical strike multiplier with attacks
War Bringer 50% more damage with attacks
'exerted attack' cluster jewel 30% increased attack damage 20% increased attack damage/ 8% chance to deal double damage/
